tourist_hotspots.Name: Pokhara
tourist_hotspots.Description: Pokhara is a city in western Nepal. Also known as the gateway to the Annapurna Circuit, Pokhara is a tourist city which attracts adventurers from all over the world.

tourist_hotspots.Name: Bandipur
tourist_hotspots.Description: Bandipur is a small hilltop village in Tanahun district (about 4-5 hrs away from Kathmandu). Over the last few years, efforts to preserve Bandipur's cultural heritage has seen it grow as a popular destination for tourism.
Things to do: Cable car ride to Manakamana Temple

tourist_hotspots.Name: Chitwan National Park
tourist_hotspots.Description: The first National Park of Nepal is home to the Royal Bengal Tiger and the One-horned Rhinocerous. Located only four hours away from Kathmandu, Chitwan is a great weekend getaway to escape chilly kathmandu winters.

tourist_hotspots.Name: Hanumandhoka Durbar Square
tourist_hotspots.Description: The historic five-acre complex sitting at the heart of Kathmandu valley was once home to the kings and queens that ruled over Kathmandu and the surrounding regions. Designated as a UNESCO world heritage site, Hanuman Dhoka is a timeless memorabilia of Nepali art, architecture, culture, and tradition. A must-visit. Also check out Patan Durbar Square and Bhaktapur Durbar Square
